post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
제게 인터뷰 요청이 왔다가 취소한 내용인데요, 이 에이전트가 저와 유사한 스킬셋이 있는 사람을 추천해달라고 합니다. 누구라고는 말씀 안드리겠지만, 레쥬메 빨리 바꾸시고 지원하세요!! 물론 전화나 이메일하시고 제 이름 (Brendan Kim) 대시길 바랍니다.
Hi Brendan:
- omitted...
Job Description: Contract 1 - Back End Processing Project Team Size: 5 Job Duties: Development, unit testing, and support of an EJB based back-end application. The application was written in legacy and PL/SQL. The task is to convert the application into an EJB based application. Developers will focus on design, implementation, debugging, and testing of EJBs. Key Skills: Java (4 yrs), Struts (2 yrs), JDBC (3 yrs), HTML (4 yrs), JavaScript (4 yrs), EJB (3 yrs), XML/XSL (2 yrs), PL/SQL (2 yrs).
Contract 2 - Utility Computing Team Size: 9 Job Description: Development, unit testing, and support of a stand alone metering infrastructure application. Developers will work with the web tier, business tier, and data access tier of the application. Struts, JDBC, JSPs are heavily used in this application. Key Skills: Java (4 yrs), Struts (2 yrs), JDBC (4 yrs), HTML (4 yrs), JavaScript (4 yrs).
Contract 3 - Brainhunter Redesign Job Description: Development, unit testing, and support of a Recruiting/Vendor Management/Applicant Tracking system which is used internally as well as sold to clients. Developers will be responsible for development, design, unit testing, and troubleshooting/support. Key Skills: Java/J2EE (4 yrs), JDBC (4 yrs), HTML (4 yrs), JavaScript (4 yrs).
Thanks and please call me after the interview to let me know how it went!
Sincerely,
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
TRACY WOLBAUM MANAGER, RECRUITING 416.225.9900 x387 F. 416.225.9104 tracy.wolbaum@brainhunter.com www.brainhunter.com
post.title: Java 개발자 포지션 3
